response.original_title: Spike & Mike's Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation: Contagious
response.overview: Contagious is Shout! Factory's fourth collection of Sick and Twisted shorts from the Spike & Mike collection. They range from the curiously cute (Doggie Style) to the romantic (The Two Minute Itch) to the gut-wrenchingly disgusting (Lloyd's Lunch Box). You'll laugh. You'll cry. You'll gag.
response.title: Spike & Mike's Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation: Contagious
